content: Just published a new issue of Architect’s Compass, breaking down the recent Cloudflare outage in simple, architectural terms — ✔ What caused it ✔ How it impacted global services ✔ Why even the most resilient platforms fail ✔ Lessons for Cloud, DevOps & Platform teamshashtag#Cloud hashtag#AI hashtag#Security hashtag#DevSecOps hashtag#Newsletter hashtag#CloudArchitecture hashtag#ArchitectsCompass hashtag#Architecture hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#DevOps hashtag#SRE hashtag#TechLeadership hashtag#LinkedInNewsletter hashtag#EngineeringExcellence hashtag#TechInsights hashtag#CloudStrategy hashtag#GCP hashtag#AWS hashtag#Azure
author: Bhushan AltiBhushan Alti

content: We are hiring a GitLab Administrator for a 12-month project with our client in Saudi Arabia. The ideal candidate will manage, configure, and optimize GitLab as the central DevOps platform. This includes maintaining users, projects, permissions, CI/CD pipelines, security, integrations with tools like Jira, Kubernetes, and Docker, as well as supporting developers and ensuring system performance, backups, and disaster recovery.
author: Yasmin MohamedYasmin Mohamed
